{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Ga√ü sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>, mit viel sch√∂nen Kupferen, <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE> <YEAR>1632</YEAR>. <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE> <VOLUME>IT. Tomes</VOLUME>, <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1744</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR> <TITLE>hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1684</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>hora Hebr. in Act. Rom. Cor.</TITLE> <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1679</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>, <PLACE>Jena</PLACE> <YEAR>1727</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Walchii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE> <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE> <YEAR>1733</YEAR>. <VOLUME>II. Tomi</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Ein Frantz√∂sischer Atlas</TITLE> von <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":9,"explanation":"1. Changed "8v6" to "8vo" in the Rollin entry (correcting format notation)
2. Changed "Eyusd." to "Ejusd." (standard abbreviation for "Ejusdem" = "of the same author")
3. Changed "fct." to "Act." (likely "Acta" = Acts)
4. Added missing FORMAT tag "4to" to the Ejusd. entry
5. Changed "Jen√ß" to "Jena" (correcting place name)
6. Changed "4t√≤" to "4to" (correcting format notation)
7. Changed "Walchn" to "Walchii" (proper Latin genitive form)
8. Fixed malformed TITLE attribute by changing "TITLE=" to "TITLE>" in Clericus entry
9. Changed "11. Tomi" to "II. Tomi" (correcting Roman numeral - should be 2 volumes, not 11)
10. Changed "&" to "&" for proper XML encoding in Clericus title"}

parsed.explanation:
1. Changed "8v6" to "8vo" in the Rollin entry (correcting format notation)
2. Changed "Eyusd." to "Ejusd." (standard abbreviation for "Ejusdem" = "of the same author")
3. Changed "fct." to "Act." (likely "Acta" = Acts)
4. Added missing FORMAT tag "4to" to the Ejusd. entry
5. Changed "Jen√ß" to "Jena" (correcting place name)
6. Changed "4t√≤" to "4to" (correcting format notation)
7. Changed "Walchn" to "Walchii" (proper Latin genitive form)
8. Fixed malformed TITLE attribute by changing "TITLE=" to "TITLE>" in Clericus entry
9. Changed "11. Tomi" to "II. Tomi" (correcting Roman numeral - should be 2 volumes, not 11)
10. Changed "&" to "&" for proper XML encoding in Clericus title
